header.author: Herman Boerhaave
header.title: An essay on the virtue and efficient cause of magnetical cures. To which is added, a new method for curing wounds without pains, and without the application of remedies. Hitherto kept as a Secret in private Families. Written originally in Latin, by the famous Dr. Herman Boerhaave, Professor at the University of Leyden in Holland, But never Published till now. By a Relation of the said Doctor; For the Good of the Publick.
